cn.releaseNotes: 错误修复及易用性改善
cn.description:
Otter是一款简洁美观的饮食日记应用，帮助你记录每天吃的食物。无需复杂的卡路里计算，只需拍照、添加备注，回顾你的饮食习惯。

◆ 为什么选择Otter？

- 可爱的水獭角色与简约设计
- 基于照片的饮食记录 – 拍摄即保存
- 无广告干扰
- iCloud跨设备同步

◆ 主要功能

- 照片饮食日记
用照片记录你的餐食，一目了然。

- 每日笔记
记录今天的状态、心情或特别的一餐。

- 喝水追踪
轻点即可记录每日饮水量。

- 体重记录
查看体重变化趋势。

- 时间线视图
在精美的时间线中浏览你的饮食历史。

- 搜索与统计
快速查找过去的餐食，查看饮食统计。

- iCloud同步
在iPhone、iPad和Mac上安全同步。


◆ 轻松的饮食管理

Otter不做评判。没有严格的卡路里计算或节食计划。只是一个温暖的伙伴，帮助你更加意识到自己吃了什么。

你吃什么，就成为什么 – 让Otter帮你记住。

联系我们：OtterDietDiary@gmail.com

cn.releaseNotes:
1、陆逊计策【焚营破阵】新增效果：当击溃任意目标时，可继续行动；
2、陆逊战法【摧克连环】及【火攻奇袭】新增效果：使两回合内下一次造成的任意伤害增加；
3、优化隐烽军：略微上调攻防属性，兵种特性“反攻”变更为“无视反击”；
4、优化部分文字描述不正确的问题；
5、优化自创武将复制后排序在被复制条目的下方；
6、优化【月下追魂】剧本中李遗配置了普通关银屏的配偶关系；
7、优化部分特别武将的亲善关系；
8、修复关银屏升级培养后，兵种特性出现文字描述不正确的问题；
9、修复出征时界面可能出现异常的问题；
cn.description:
经典三国单机版

《逐鹿》是一款基于同名历史沙盘游戏引擎开发而成的三国题材回合制策略游戏。在硝烟四起、诸侯争霸的三国乱世中，玩家可以在剧本中任意选择势力，饰演主公。通过内政、外交等玩法助你运筹帷幄。带领麾下群雄，攻城略地，在辽阔的战场上开疆扩土。或兴复汉室，或成一代枭雄，皆掌握在你的手中。

问鼎九州，逐鹿三国

《逐鹿》的历史剧本以《三国演义》为蓝本推演而来，游戏贯穿历史典故，力求还原三国时期的史实风貌。玩家可以任意挑选剧本，并饰演其中一势力的主公，谋定三国，一统九州。

山河为子，天下为局

《逐鹿》以经典六角战棋玩法为核心战斗模式，玩家可以指挥部队以“六角战棋”的形式纵横驰骋于大战场之上，或与敌人短兵相接，或以计谋决胜千里之外，在矢石之间，开疆扩土。

坚甲利兵，攻无不克

在游戏中兵种可分为步兵、骑兵、机械三大类，细分则有弓兵、弩兵、盾兵、轻骑兵等十余种。还有数十种专属兵种可以携带，出征时根据战况调配兵种阵容，能够达到先发制人，克敌机先的效果。

鸾翔凤集，龙幡虎纛

根据历史文献记载以及结合三国演义内容，目前游戏中已设计武将有600余名。每个武将具有独特的特性，可以凸显武将的差异化。不仅如此，我们还为历史名将绘制了精致的专属立绘，彰显其个性。

cn.description:
《迷雾北境》（Bad North）是一款迷人又残酷的实时策略游戏。带领你绝望的子民，捍卫你宁静祥和的岛国，对抗维京部落的入侵者。指挥你忠诚的臣民充分利用每个岛屿的地理优势作为战术优势。一切都危在旦夕：失败，并看着你子民的鲜血染红了土地。
继续战斗，勇士们。不是为了权力、财富或荣耀，只希望和平再次降临这片绝境。

【游戏特色】
1.实时战术肉鸽玩法：调兵遣将抵御维京入侵，敌人会随机应变威胁你的布局。谨慎选择战场，周密规划转移路线！指挥官阵亡无法复活，一旦失败将永久失去所有进度！

2.即时战略动态博弈：你坐镇后方运筹帷幄，士兵们则在前线自主应对战局。下达战略指令，观察部队在战场上即时做出临场反应。

3.随机生成奇幻岛屿：每座岛屿皆风景如画且地形迥异。你只有一次拯救家园的机会，必须根据独特地貌制定万全之策。

4.军队养成进阶体系：愈精锐的防守带来越丰厚的战利品。将你的子民从散兵游勇逐步培养成百战雄师，用资源把民兵锻造成传奇勇士。

【联系我们】
Q群：568959503
客服QQ：2853302554/3002921159
若您在游戏过程中，遇到任何问题或有建议反馈，可通过以上任何渠道与我们进行联系。

《魔法工艺》是一款魔法动作俯视角Roguelike法术构筑类游戏，玩家将作为误入此世界拔出了传说法杖的勇者，讨伐怪物、组合独一无二的法术、击败古神、拯救这个被古神入侵的世界！
cn.description:
传说！拔出法杖的人将会成为拯救世界的勇者！

《魔法工艺》是一款魔法动作roguelike游戏。游戏以被古神入侵的世界为核心，打造了一个架空的魔法奇幻世界。
玩家将作为误入此世界又拔出了传说法杖的勇者，讨伐怪物、组合独一无二的法术、击败古神、拯救这个被古神入侵的世界！


—Q版的画风—
魔性的画风，奇异的生物，无厘头的剧情，误入异世界的主角如何与这些可爱的蘑菇和触手共存？
来自异世界的大法师即将踏上独属于他的魔法创造之路！

—自由的组合—
多样的法术，独特的法杖，奇妙的组合，被选中的命运主角将如何发挥他的聪明才智挑战搭配变化？
通过击败怪物获得各种特性的法术，组合出仅属于你的禁咒魔法吧！

—随机的强化—
随机的祝福，神秘的药水，特殊的灵魂，探索之中遇见的伙伴们又将给主角带来怎样的新鲜体验？
每次挑战都会是全新的体验，选择你的天赋，加强自己的能力吧！

—炫酷的战斗—
森林的异变，城堡的古旧，时空裂缝的混乱，拔出祭坛之上法杖的你历经多次战斗，击败怪物，获得了足以拯救世界的力量，你最终的选择，将何去何从？
多彩绚丽的华丽战斗，钻研各类法术的特性，成为真正的大法师吧！

cn.releaseNotes:
（重要！）本次更新后已完成所有苹果4G运存与6G运存手机的适配了，从iPhone11至17都能流畅游戏！
（感谢大家这两个月的等待与支持，我们会继续努力更新内容、做好进一步的效果与优化）

第十四部大型资料片“黑榜风云”第二弹重点内容
资料片特色内容1、全新资料片“黑榜风云”
1、天下英雄谱之“黑榜”（第一期）
“一卷《天下英雄谱》横空出世，列尽武林风流人物”，天下英雄谱之“黑榜”：朔海派教主“丁老怪”、黑沙寨寨主“崔振炀”、十二连环坞当家“鹰眼老七”等黑榜高手登场：
1)解锁跌宕起伏的黑榜风云剧情，获得独特产出！
2)大侠们将有机会与他们一同修炼专属武学，培养独属于你和黑榜人物的天赋、乃至神功秘籍、绝世神兵！
3)与江湖2原有的伙伴、结义、结缘、同门的玩法深度结合，更沉浸式的体验。
4)如同天下英雄谱之“百花谱”一样，我们将以“天下英雄”为核心，逐个资料片的塑造江湖中有血有肉的各类人物（参考古龙先生对角色的塑造）



2、黑榜枭雄并起，绿林豪杰争雄！全新黑榜风云剧情玩法
1)黑沙寨裂旗扬威，十二连环坞暗流绞杀，朔海派炼狱重开！三派枭雄竞逐黑榜魁首，胜者掌生杀大权，败者尸骨无存！新增相关门派全新黑榜剧情及挑战
2)天下三大镖局风云骤起，深陷黑榜漩涡！新增三大镖局黑榜相关恩怨情仇（隐藏剧情，还请大侠自行探索）


资料片特色内容2、新武学、新特效
1)武学新增：十二卷天魔策及其对应大型奇遇探险
2)武学特效：十二卷天魔策全套特效


资料片特色内容3、全新关系与经历玩法
全新关系与经历，根据主角与NPC关系动态生成交互事件和玩法（逐步更新）：
1)主角与NPC情分值达到一定程度会触发隐藏剧情
2)主角受伤严重时会有好友前来相助
3)特殊NPC在队伍或门派中有不同的羁绊效果


资料片特色内容4、全新传闻玩法
更具有江湖味，动态传闻事件与大世界生态、时辰、诸多玩法紧密结合，更多稀有奖励与全局成就！（逐步更新）




【（重要！）暗黑江湖相关优化】
由于我们是首次尝试暗黑打宝模式，我们会根据大家的反馈持续优化刷宝体验。衷心感谢大家这些天在社区和官微群提出的宝贵体验反馈！
1、暗黑江湖数值相关调整：
1)下调了暗黑江湖穿戴装备的属性要求，最高下调至更新前的50%
2)下调了暗黑江湖淮临珠词条属性和经脉洗炼的数值上限，老档已获取的淮临珠和已洗炼的经脉属性不受影响。欢迎大侠们来官微群与我们讨论
3)调整了整体技能减伤叠加上限，从更新前的100%调整为85%


2、暗黑江湖养成相关：
1)暗黑江湖增加回锻的装备类型，在营地铁匠（216,206）回锻
2)暗黑江湖增加强化的装备类型，在营地铁匠（216,206）锤炼



3、暗黑江湖优化和调整：
1)优化了因暗黑江湖NPC身上金钱不足，导致大侠们无法交易道具的问题，更新后营地铁匠、药师身上金钱大幅增加

cn.description:
【核心特色：这就是你从未体验过的江湖】

1.  “移动端发货”：独属于你的无缝武侠大世界，真实武林画卷
       无读条世界：告别加载画面！我们打造了一个面积达256丈的无缝大世界——中原、江南、西域、南疆……从熙熙攘攘的古城街区，到人迹罕至的雪山秘境，所有场景皆可自由探索。
       活的江湖：昼夜、真实天气、万物动态（可破坏环境、可拾取万物）。世界不仅仅是背景，更是可交互的阶段。
       无束缚体验：轻功飞跃山河，踏波而行，攀爬峭壁。你的武侠梦，不再受束缚。

（我们的核心是创造一个‘无界’的武侠世界。在这里，地图没有空气墙，探索没有读条，整个世界是连贯、可交互、充满生机的）

2.  “第一代最受欢迎的玩法”：千种武学心法，自由搭配的武侠战斗
       没有僵化的“职业”限制！我们提供了超过数百种内功、外功、轻功、技艺。你可以是刀剑双绝的豪侠，也可以是精通音律、以琴音伤人的雅士，甚至是暗器毒术无双的“邪派”高手。
       武学招式不再是一成不变的关键循环。采用我们“无规则”战斗系统，所有的招式心苦自由搭配、组合，你自己的套路。是追求一击必杀的极限爆发，还是决定组建全场连绵不绝的控制？战斗的策略与乐趣，完全交由你。

3.  “你的江湖”：高自由度的人生，你的选择就是规则
       江湖不是非黑即白。你的每一个抉择都会引发难以想象的“因果链”。救下一个路人，他可能就是你未来宗门的引荐人；偷听一桩秘密，或许会让你卷入颠覆王朝的阴谋。
       可以选择拜入名门正派的恪守门规，也可以加入诡谲魔教随心所欲，更可以做个散人，逍遥自在。甚至可以完全抛开打杀，成为一名富甲天下的商贾、巧夺天工的匠人，也可以悬壶济世的神医。这个世界，认可你的每一种活法。

4.  “多达700万字的文本内容，庞大的玩法量级”：沙盒奇遇，要素隐藏线索
       《下一站江湖Ⅱ》的世界是“活”的。NPC们有自己的生活记录和喜怒哀乐。你可能在悬崖下发现前辈遗骸，学到失传绝学；也可能一碗酒，结交到一位隐世高人。
       大量未在任务列表中标记的“奇遇”事件散落在世界各个角落。探索的回报远超你的想象，真正的宝藏，永远献给最好奇的旅人。

5.  “市井百业，多维度沉浸身份”：技艺百态，感受江湖的烟火气
       江湖不止有武功。我们深入嵌入了当今同类生活技能：采矿、采药、锻造、制琴、象棋、书法、绘画、厨艺……这些不仅仅是赚钱的手段，更是提升角色、解锁特殊剧情和关卡能力的关键。一门技艺的技能，也能让你名动江湖。

【故事背景：游戏基础框架】（持续更新）
700万文字庞大世界观：战国末期，三国、百家、江湖！

1.  角色扮演：
① 多出身多结局，每个主角都是全新体验（当前已将门之子、富家千金、寒门书生、江湖浪子、无名小卒等五大身出300多万字主线剧情接近20个结局）

2.  市井身份：
① 皈依各器皿特色的城井身份独特的对应独立剧情、规则玩法。比如刺客对应青衣楼的门玩法派、以及相关的物品万字独立剧情，突出的悬赏及刺杀玩法等

3.  江湖霸图：模拟经营、骑砍LIKE、世界建造
① 物品可加入各具特色的门派
② 每个派都有自己的独立剧情以及与其他门派的恩怨，比如狂刀门和绝剑门的火烧凌云窟大型剧情
③ 每个门派都有自己突出的突出体系，以及规则：比如少林的从扫地僧至罗汉堂首座，敲钟玩法及铜人阵
④ 每个门派都强调自己的武学、心法体系
⑤ 每个门派都可以模拟经营、占领大世界的比如矿山青楼，并开启对应的经营
⑥ 每个门派都一样骑马与砍杀一样的世界争霸

4.  自由成长：习百家武学，走你自己的江湖

cn.description:
朱门酒肉臭，路有冻死骨！ 
四大家族助纣为虐！天罚将至！ 
逆天犯顺，必有异象。 
七月飞霜，唯有血偿。 

《暖雪》是一款暗黑风武侠类的动作Roguelite游戏。游戏以诡异的“暖雪”为核心打造了一个完全架空的黑暗奇幻世界，你将扮演代号“狴犴”的侠士去讨伐五大家族，拯救这个摇摇欲坠的世界！ 

【剑与雪的黑暗传说】 
龙武二十七年，天空突降怪雪，此雪不寒且温，亦不融。后世称之为“暖雪”。吸入“暖雪“的人丧失神智，变成怪物。自此人间堕入疯狂，世界飘摇欲坠。这一切的背后……究竟是天怒降罚，还是邪神作祟？ 将由你来探寻。 游戏中，你将作为侠士“狴犴”踏上旅途，寻找暖雪背后的真相，让黑暗迎来终结！ 

【自由搭配出万种变化】 
七大宗派，百般圣物，莫测神兵，丰富的Rogue元素让你百玩不厌。 七大独特宗派，十四种核心玩法，搭配海量神兵与圣物，每种圣物拥有四种完全不同的特殊效果，神兵又能与特定宗派联动诞生奇妙反应，每一次进入世界都是一场全新体验，选择你最喜爱的玩法，用万般过关方式，挑战无限可能。 

【超爽感的飞剑系统】 
剑来亦去，光影之间，灰飞烟灭。你可以操纵各式属性的飞剑对敌人进行多样化的打击，连携近战攻击与多种圣物加成，你可以一招制敌，亦可飞剑如雪，享受专属于你的畅爽战斗快感。 

【不断重生制敌，收集真相的碎片】
你可以通过消耗红色灵魂自由分配点数到天赋树中，永久地加强自己的能力。
没有人能直接告诉你暖雪世界的真相…….一切藏在随机掉落的“记忆碎片”之中，而你将不断重生制敌收集碎片。准备好发现五大家族间不为人知的骇人秘闻，层层剥开隐藏在故事背后的真相了吗？

【针对移动端进行的优化】
· 自定义键位及自动瞬身：根据你的喜好调整按钮的位置及大小，通过开关启用左摇杆自动瞬身。
· 自由调整视距：根据你的喜好调整屏幕显示的大小。
· 自动索敌：通过开关启用近战自动索敌，加倍丝滑战斗体验。

*推荐各位细胞人使用云存档功能备份存档~避免卸载原安装包后出现存档丢失的情况。

以下为本次更新内容：

-修复了击败国王之手后发生的撞车事故

同时在切换设备，或者重装游戏的时候，本地的存档会随着卸载丢失，推荐大家使用云存档功能来进行游戏进度的备份~请注意，云存档的目的是解决换机和数据备份的需求，上传及下载操作不可逆，且均需要手动操作。
cn.description:
死亡并非永眠。

操作炼金实验失败的产物，在杀戮与重生的反复轮回中探索一座房间不断变化的巨大城堡，解开这座阴暗孤岛上的秘密…!
当然，前提是你能战胜镇守其中的诸多守卫。

重生细胞是一款RogueVania类型的平台动作游戏。你需要在一次一次战斗中锤炼战斗技巧，精通拥有独特使用方式的各种武器，并且将翻滚和闪避等走位操作视为本能，以逃过那些出其不意出现的怪潮侵袭，迎战强横凶残的守卫和Boss。

鏖战、死亡、重生、再战

继PC与主机平台之后，《重生细胞》准备在移动平台开启战斗！

【主要特色】
• RogueVania: 逐步攻略经过悉心设计的相连关卡，体验rogue-lite类型的重复可玩性，直面肾上腺素激增的凶险场面。
• 凌厉爽快的2D动作体验：洞悉敌人的出手套路灵活走位，否则你将止步于半途，无缘城堡中隐藏的更多秘密。
• 非线性进程：在反复的死亡中突破难关，根据自己的游玩风格或心情自由选择装备与技能搭配。厌倦了臭气熏天的下水道？攀上城头呼吸新鲜的空气吧！
• 随心所欲的游玩：探索城堡的边边角角和隐秘通道，发现深藏在城堡深处的迷人景观，抑或是直冲终点？一切由你。

【针对移动平台进行的悉心优化】
• 两种攻击模式：传统与移动版新加入的自动攻击系统。
• 定制键位与触屏操作：根据你的喜好调整按钮位置及大小，通过触屏滑动来进行闪避走位…
• MFi设备以及主机控制器蓝牙连接特性支持。

cn.description:
Genius Scan是一款可装入口袋的扫描仪。 可随时随地快速扫描文档，并能导出为JPEG或多页PDF文件。

*** Apple App of the Week *** 2000多万用户 *** 1000多家小企业 ***

将任何文档放在设备的相机前面：我们的扫描仪应用程序会自动识别背景纸张，裁剪纸张并清理结果。您可以获得清晰易读的扫描。批量扫描可让您在几秒钟内扫描数十页。强大的工具可帮助您组织、共享或归档文档。

“这是一款绝对精彩的应用。” -  AppSafari.com

“下一次出差时别忘了下载一个 Genius Scan，可以给自己和会计部门带来很大方便。” -  AppPicker.com

==企业版== 

 Genius Scan+ Premium Pack： 

 - 开箱即用（无需升级）Genius Scan+ 的所有高级功能（用下方的 + 表示）。 

管理配置： 

 - 部署到由MDM工具管理的设备中
 - 按用户预先配置部署应用程序设置（例如，设置默认电子邮件地址，WebDAV / FTP 凭据） 
 - 控制用户可以将文档导出到哪些应用程序和服务
 - 无广告

==主要功能== 

智能扫描： 

 - 文件检测和背景移除
 - 失真校正
 - 阴影去除和缺陷清理
 - 滤镜（黑白、白板、照片） 
 - 批量扫描

 PDF创建和编辑： 

 - 文档合并和拆分
 - 多页PDF创建
 - 照片和PDF导入

安全和隐私： 

 - 设备上文档处理
 + 面容_ID 
 + PDF密码加密

文件组织： 

 - 文档标记
 - 元数据和内容搜索
 + 自定义命名方案（智能文档名称） 
 + 使用Genius Cloud进行备份和多设备同步（单独订阅） 

导出：

 - 电子邮件
 + Box, Dropbox, Evernote, Expensify, Google Drive, iCloud Drive, OneDrive, OneNote, FTP, SugarSync, WebDAV. 
 + 任何与WebDAV兼容的服务，例如Citrix ShareFile、NextCloud、ownCloud、Synology、Yandex。 
 + 自动后台自动导出

OCR（文本识别）：

 + 文字提取
 + 创建可搜索的PDF
 + 扫描名片和创建联系人

==关于我们== 

The Grizzly Labs在法国巴黎市中心开发了Genius Scan。我们制作能够帮助全世界数百万用户的应用程序并在质量和隐私方面保持最高标准，我们为此感到自豪。如果您有任何疑问，请通过@thegrizzlylabs联系我们。

==定价和法律==

您可以订阅Genius Cloud进行备份和同步。在这种情况下，Genius Scan的商店会显示每个订阅的持续时间和价格，并在购买时更新。订单确认后，将从iTunes帐户中收取付款。除非在当前期间结束前24小时内关闭自动续订，否则订阅会自动续订。管理订阅，禁用iTunes帐户设置中的自动续订。

https://www.thegrizzlylabs.com/genius-scan/cloud/terms

hk.description:
Otter is a simple and beautiful food diary app that helps you track what you eat every day. No calorie counting, no complicated databases – just take photos, add notes, and reflect on your eating habits.

◆ WHY OTTER?

- Clean, minimal design with an adorable otter character
- Photo-based meal tracking – snap and save
- No ads, no distractions
- iCloud sync across all your devices

◆ FEATURES

- Photo Food Journal
Capture your meals with photos. A picture is worth a thousand calories – see what you eat at a glance.

- Daily Notes
Write about your day, how you felt, or what made each meal special.

- Water Tracker
Stay hydrated! Track your daily water intake with simple tap controls.

- Weight Log
Monitor your weight trends over time with easy-to-read records.

- Timeline View
Browse your food history in a beautiful timeline. See patterns in your eating habits.

- Search & Stats
Find past meals quickly and view your eating statistics.

- iCloud Sync
Your food diary stays safe and syncs automatically across iPhone, iPad, and Mac.


◆ A MINDFUL APPROACH TO EATING

Otter doesn't judge. There's no calorie counting or strict diet plans. Just a gentle companion to help you become more aware of what you eat. 

You are what you eat – let Otter help you remember it.

Questions? Contact us at OtterDietDiary@gmail.com

hk.description:
【劇情】
 在有著神界和冥府存在的世界，其地上的某處……
 矗立在湖中，堅不可摧的古城阿本海姆維持著一定的平衡，
 但不知從何時起，由於冥府的力量而逐漸被黑暗侵蝕。
 有為了盡忠因而喪命的人，也有知道真相後背叛的人……
 因各種心思導致眾人劍拔弩張，秩序突然崩潰……
 
 在極度混亂中，出現了一名不屬於任何騎士團，
 身穿神秘鎧甲的少女。
 當她與彷徨的靈魂「威斯普」相遇時，
 是否會成為照亮黑暗的那道光芒呢……
 要跟隨誰又要相信什麼……結局將會因你的行動而有所不同。

【特點】
 本作是一款玩家將扮演「威斯普」，
 需要即時向「騎士」下達命令
 與格子上的敵人戰鬥的「即時動態戰略彈幕RPG」。
 操縱威斯普，閃躲敵人發動的彈幕攻擊，
 對騎士們下達命令來打倒敵人吧！
 
 可和超過140名的騎士成為夥伴。
 每名騎士之間皆有像是家人或朋友等等不同的關係，
 利用遊戲中的靜止畫面對話功能，可以深入理解未公開的真相

hk.description: The table features the player as a member of a space fleet that completes missions to increase rank. Players can attain nine different ranks (listed from lowest to highest): Cadet, Ensign, Lieutenant, Captain, LT Commander, Commander, Commodore, Admiral, and Fleet Admiral. Players accept a mission by hitting "mission targets" which select which mission they will take, and by going up the "launch ramp". Each mission has a set number of things for players to do, such as hitting the "attack bumpers" (which are a set of four bumpers at the top of the table) eight times (this is the "target practice" mission). Some missions involve a number of steps which must be completed in sequence. Missions end either by being completed, or by being aborted due to running out of "fuel", as indicated by the lights in the passage that passes under the launch ramp. The "fuel" lights go out one by one at a time interval, and can be re-lit by having the ball go over them, or all at once by going up the launch ramp again. Upon completing a mission, some of the blue lights in a circle in the middle of the table turn on. When all of the lights in the blue circle turn on, the player's rank increases, and a light in the orange circle turns on.

hk.releaseNotes:
付费DLC「終業」現已推出！超大型量更新，揭開故事最終章，決戰何羅古神！
【v3.1.2 更新公告】
*請各位剷雪官直接進行安裝，不要將舊版本解除安裝，否則會丢失本地存檔！推薦使用雲存檔功能多次存檔備份~
*已新增離線登入功能，除首次安裝遊戲時需完成登入驗證，後續可於離線狀態下進行遊戲。

-----------以下為本次更新內容----------

DLC「終業」： 
狴犴於灰燼夢中昏睡的十年間，何羅邪神被徹底釋放，人間世一片狼藉。在玲瓏和眾人的苦苦支撐下何羅反抗軍曾一度看到希望，但在瘋狂與絕望面前，一切都是那麼脆弱…… 
而今狴犴終於從無盡噩夢中甦醒，回到現實世界，他將再次踏上旅途，展開最終之戰。
【新章節】新增五大章節，Boss強勁挑戰 
5大全新章節，帶領你穿越一個既熟悉又陌生的世界，逐步接近千年前隱藏在地心深處的蛇王朝聖地。 6位強大的關底Boss將為玩家帶來全新的挑戰！
【新宗派】三大全新宗派，暢快戰鬥體驗 
全新加入日月輪轉雙天、閻羅地藏明王、靈劍修羅三大宗派，以及6種宗派技能，為玩家帶來前所未有的戰鬥體驗！
【新天賦】森羅萬象系統，自由搭配殘響 
全新的天賦樹系統，有限的天賦點數將有限的天賦點數決定了成長路線的博弈和抉擇，更有無限森羅模式打破一切上限！ 配合特殊符文——時間殘響，豐富的條目和效果為build搭配提供更高的自由度和強度上限。
【新劇情】海量故事碎片，三大結局由你選擇
 古神之力無法輕易被摧毀，你的不同選擇將導致三大不同結局！穿越時間線，挑戰各種難度，尋找能拯救所有人的方法！
【新適配】移動端專屬功能 
新增「自動釋放收劍」功能，讓操作更加流暢
hk.description:
朱門酒肉臭，路有凍死骨！ 
四大家族助紂為虐！天譴將至！ 
逆天犯順，必有異象。 
七月飛霜，唯有血償。 

《暖雪》是一款暗黑風武俠類動作 Roguelike 遊戲。遊戲以詭異的「暖雪」為中心，塑造出完全虛構的黑暗奇幻世界。你在遊戲中扮演外號「狴犴」的俠士，討伐五大家族，拯救這個搖搖欲墜的世界！ 

【劍與雪的黑暗傳說】 
龍武二十七年，天空忽降怪雪，此雪不寒且溫，亦不融化。後世稱之為「暖雪」。吸入「暖雪」者無不喪失神智，變成怪物。自此人間墮入瘋狂，世界飄搖欲墜。這一切的背後……究竟是天怒降罰，還是邪神作祟？箇中真相為何，就待你探尋。你會遊戲中化身為俠士「狴犴」踏上旅途，尋找暖雪背後的真相，為黑暗時代畫上句號！ 

【自由配搭，變化萬千】 
七大宗派，百般聖物，莫測神兵，豐富的 Rogue 元素讓你百玩不厭。七大獨特宗派，十四種核心玩法，加上大量神兵和聖物，每種聖物均具有四種截然不同的特殊效果，神兵又能與特定宗派聯動，產生奇妙反應，讓你每次進入世界都必定會有一番全新體驗。選擇你的心水玩法，用萬千方式過關，挑戰無限可能。 

【爽爆飛劍系統】 
劍來亦去，光影之間，灰飛煙滅。你可以操縱各式屬性的飛劍，以多種方式打擊敵人。既可以結合近戰攻擊和多種聖物加成，一招制敵；亦可以飛劍如雪，享受獨一無二的舒暢戰鬥快感。 

【不斷重生殺敵，蒐集真相的碎片】
你可以消耗紅色靈魂，自由分配點數至天賦樹，永久加強自身能力。
沒有人能直接告訴你暖雪世界的真相……一切藏在隨機掉落的「記憶碎片」之中，而你將不斷重生殺敵，收集碎片。準備好查明五大家族間不為人知的駭人秘聞，層層剝開箇中真相了嗎？

【操作方便，專為手遊而設】
· 自訂按鍵位置及自動瞬身：玩家可隨個人喜好調整按鈕的位置及大小，更可切換啟用左搖桿自動瞬身功能。
· 自由調整視距：你可應個人喜好調整畫面的顯示大小。
· 自動索敵：切換啟用近戰自動索敵功能，令戰鬥體驗加倍順暢。

最低設備要求：iOS12.0 或更新版本，記憶體要求：4GB，可用 RAM：4GB

SUPPORT
遊戲中遇到任何問題，皆可透過遊戲內的客服中心提出回饋。

Twitter：https://twitter.com/WarmSnowGame
Discord: https://discord.gg/gC2nRfEQ

hk.description:
"""你是否知道“Schadenfreude”是德语单词，意思是幸灾乐祸？这也是构建《邻居地狱归来》的主要思想。整个电视节目基于对你的脾气暴躁的邻居进行越来越残酷的恶作剧，以使观众开心，收视率高。在受2000年代早期邪恶电视启发的闹剧盛会中变坏很不错！ 

作为《邻居地狱归来》的睚眦必报的主角伍迪，你将穿越虚构但恰如其名的电视节目的第1季和第2季。一路上对讨厌的邻居进行恶作剧，一直到中国、印度、墨西哥，你将确保他的假期成为活生生的地狱。当你在进行恶作剧时，为什么只瞄准邻居呢？你可以让他的母亲和其他旅伴牵涉其中。无论你决定做什么，你值得信赖的摄制组都会在那里，并时刻关注所有行动。你可以让自己狂放的创造力自由驰骋，并观看邻居在绝望中愤怒。请注意不要被他或他的同伴抓住，否则他们会大声呼叫，并且你的电视节目将被停播。另一方面，如果你表现良好，则通过在邻居的生活中造成越来越多的混乱，收视率将会提高，你可能会赢得声名远播的奖项。 ""

邻居地狱归来1和2在一个包中进行重制：28个剧集，以邻居家中、邮轮上以及世界各地几个不同的度假地点为背景

- 在全高清中新渲染的所有图形

hk.description:
在終極駕駛遊樂場中燃燒橡膠並撕碎金屬！

Wreckfest 充滿了升級和自定義選項。無論您是準備使用加固保險槓、防滾架、側面保護裝置等進行下一次拆遷德比，還是使用空氣濾清器、凸輪軸、燃油系統等發動機性能部件為您的汽車進行一場激烈的比賽，Wreckfest 正在成為最好的競技賽車遊戲。

• 獨特的賽車體驗 –只有通過逼真的物理模擬才能實現。見證在高速賽道上瘋狂的並駕齊驅，在充滿交叉路口和迎面而來的車輛的瘋狂賽道上面臨徹底的破壞瘋狂，或者在德比賽場上大獲全勝。

• 很棒的汽車—— 我們的汽車很舊，被撞壞了，被拼湊在一起......他們散發出風格和個性！從老美國重擊手到敏捷的歐洲人和有趣的亞洲人，你在其他遊戲中找不到這樣的東西。

• 有意義的定制 – 不僅可以改變汽車的外觀，還可以升級它們的防彈衣 – 用重鐵加固它們保護您免受損壞，但也會增加重量，這會影響汽車的操控性。修改您的汽車，以製造堅固的坦克或易碎但閃電般快速的火箭，或介於兩者之間的任何東西！

• 多人遊戲 - 在本地多人遊戲中破壞你的朋友，在追逐爆破優勢的同時將賽車推向極限！

• 挑戰模式 - 與農作物收割機、割草機、校車、三輪車等等一起玩得開心！

• 職業生涯模式 – 爭奪冠軍，賺取經驗，解鎖新的升級和車輛，並成為歷史上的 Wreckfest 冠軍！

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

- Weight Log
Monitor your weight trends over time with easy-to-read records.

- Timeline View
Browse your food history in a beautiful timeline. See patterns in your eating habits.

Find past meals quickly and view your eating statistics.

- iCloud Sync
Your food diary stays safe and syncs automatically across iPhone, iPad, and Mac.


◆ A MINDFUL APPROACH TO EATING

Otter doesn't judge. There's no calorie counting or strict diet plans. Just a gentle companion to help you become more aware of what you eat. 

You are what you eat – let Otter help you remember it.

Questions? Contact us at OtterDietDiary@gmail.com

mo.description: The table features the player as a member of a space fleet that completes missions to increase rank. Players can attain nine different ranks (listed from lowest to highest): Cadet, Ensign, Lieutenant, Captain, LT Commander, Commander, Commodore, Admiral, and Fleet Admiral. Players accept a mission by hitting "mission targets" which select which mission they will take, and by going up the "launch ramp". Each mission has a set number of things for players to do, such as hitting the "attack bumpers" (which are a set of four bumpers at the top of the table) eight times (this is the "target practice" mission). Some missions involve a number of steps which must be completed in sequence. Missions end either by being completed, or by being aborted due to running out of "fuel", as indicated by the lights in the passage that passes under the launch ramp. The "fuel" lights go out one by one at a time interval, and can be re-lit by having the ball go over them, or all at once by going up the launch ramp again. Upon completing a mission, some of the blue lights in a circle in the middle of the table turn on. When all of the lights in the blue circle turn on, the player's rank increases, and a light in the orange circle turns on.

mo.releaseNotes:
付费DLC「終業」現已推出！超大型量更新，揭開故事最終章，決戰何羅古神！
【v3.1.2 更新公告】
*請各位剷雪官直接進行安裝，不要將舊版本解除安裝，否則會丢失本地存檔！推薦使用雲存檔功能多次存檔備份~
*已新增離線登入功能，除首次安裝遊戲時需完成登入驗證，後續可於離線狀態下進行遊戲。

-----------以下為本次更新內容----------

DLC「終業」： 
狴犴於灰燼夢中昏睡的十年間，何羅邪神被徹底釋放，人間世一片狼藉。在玲瓏和眾人的苦苦支撐下何羅反抗軍曾一度看到希望，但在瘋狂與絕望面前，一切都是那麼脆弱…… 
而今狴犴終於從無盡噩夢中甦醒，回到現實世界，他將再次踏上旅途，展開最終之戰。
【新章節】新增五大章節，Boss強勁挑戰 
5大全新章節，帶領你穿越一個既熟悉又陌生的世界，逐步接近千年前隱藏在地心深處的蛇王朝聖地。 6位強大的關底Boss將為玩家帶來全新的挑戰！
【新宗派】三大全新宗派，暢快戰鬥體驗 
全新加入日月輪轉雙天、閻羅地藏明王、靈劍修羅三大宗派，以及6種宗派技能，為玩家帶來前所未有的戰鬥體驗！
【新天賦】森羅萬象系統，自由搭配殘響 
全新的天賦樹系統，有限的天賦點數將有限的天賦點數決定了成長路線的博弈和抉擇，更有無限森羅模式打破一切上限！ 配合特殊符文——時間殘響，豐富的條目和效果為build搭配提供更高的自由度和強度上限。
【新劇情】海量故事碎片，三大結局由你選擇
 古神之力無法輕易被摧毀，你的不同選擇將導致三大不同結局！穿越時間線，挑戰各種難度，尋找能拯救所有人的方法！
【新適配】移動端專屬功能 
新增「自動釋放收劍」功能，讓操作更加流暢
mo.description:
朱門酒肉臭，路有凍死骨！ 
四大家族助紂為虐！天譴將至！ 
逆天犯順，必有異象。 
七月飛霜，唯有血償。 

《暖雪》是一款暗黑風武俠類動作 Roguelike 遊戲。遊戲以詭異的「暖雪」為中心，塑造出完全虛構的黑暗奇幻世界。你在遊戲中扮演外號「狴犴」的俠士，討伐五大家族，拯救這個搖搖欲墜的世界！ 

【劍與雪的黑暗傳說】 
龍武二十七年，天空忽降怪雪，此雪不寒且溫，亦不融化。後世稱之為「暖雪」。吸入「暖雪」者無不喪失神智，變成怪物。自此人間墮入瘋狂，世界飄搖欲墜。這一切的背後……究竟是天怒降罰，還是邪神作祟？箇中真相為何，就待你探尋。你會遊戲中化身為俠士「狴犴」踏上旅途，尋找暖雪背後的真相，為黑暗時代畫上句號！ 

【自由配搭，變化萬千】 
七大宗派，百般聖物，莫測神兵，豐富的 Rogue 元素讓你百玩不厭。七大獨特宗派，十四種核心玩法，加上大量神兵和聖物，每種聖物均具有四種截然不同的特殊效果，神兵又能與特定宗派聯動，產生奇妙反應，讓你每次進入世界都必定會有一番全新體驗。選擇你的心水玩法，用萬千方式過關，挑戰無限可能。 

【爽爆飛劍系統】 
劍來亦去，光影之間，灰飛煙滅。你可以操縱各式屬性的飛劍，以多種方式打擊敵人。既可以結合近戰攻擊和多種聖物加成，一招制敵；亦可以飛劍如雪，享受獨一無二的舒暢戰鬥快感。 

【不斷重生殺敵，蒐集真相的碎片】
你可以消耗紅色靈魂，自由分配點數至天賦樹，永久加強自身能力。
沒有人能直接告訴你暖雪世界的真相……一切藏在隨機掉落的「記憶碎片」之中，而你將不斷重生殺敵，收集碎片。準備好查明五大家族間不為人知的駭人秘聞，層層剝開箇中真相了嗎？

【操作方便，專為手遊而設】
· 自訂按鍵位置及自動瞬身：玩家可隨個人喜好調整按鈕的位置及大小，更可切換啟用左搖桿自動瞬身功能。
· 自由調整視距：你可應個人喜好調整畫面的顯示大小。
· 自動索敵：切換啟用近戰自動索敵功能，令戰鬥體驗加倍順暢。

最低設備要求：iOS12.0 或更新版本，記憶體要求：4GB，可用 RAM：4GB

SUPPORT
遊戲中遇到任何問題，皆可透過遊戲內的客服中心提出回饋。
客服信箱：warmsnowgh@bilibili.com
官方網站：https://warmsnow.biligames.com
Twitter：https://twitter.com/WarmSnowGame
Discord: https://discord.gg/gC2nRfEQ
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@warmsnow6951

tw.description: The table features the player as a member of a space fleet that completes missions to increase rank. Players can attain nine different ranks (listed from lowest to highest): Cadet, Ensign, Lieutenant, Captain, LT Commander, Commander, Commodore, Admiral, and Fleet Admiral. Players accept a mission by hitting "mission targets" which select which mission they will take, and by going up the "launch ramp". Each mission has a set number of things for players to do, such as hitting the "attack bumpers" (which are a set of four bumpers at the top of the table) eight times (this is the "target practice" mission). Some missions involve a number of steps which must be completed in sequence. Missions end either by being completed, or by being aborted due to running out of "fuel", as indicated by the lights in the passage that passes under the launch ramp. The "fuel" lights go out one by one at a time interval, and can be re-lit by having the ball go over them, or all at once by going up the launch ramp again. Upon completing a mission, some of the blue lights in a circle in the middle of the table turn on. When all of the lights in the blue circle turn on, the player's rank increases, and a light in the orange circle turns on.

Genius Scan 是一款可裝入口袋的掃描器。 可隨時隨地快速掃描文件，並能匯出為JPEG或多頁PDF檔案。

*** Apple App of the Week *** 2000多萬使用者 *** 1000多家小企業 ***

將任何文件放在裝置的相機前面：我們的掃描儀應用程式會自動識別背景紙張，裁剪紙張並清理結果。您可以獲得清晰易讀的掃描。批量掃描可讓您在幾秒鐘內掃描數十頁。強大的工具可幫助您組織、共享或歸檔文件。

“下一次出差時別忘了下載一個Genius Scan，可以給自己和會計部門帶來很大方便。” - AppPicker.com

“相機應用不適合對文字進行近距離掃描，但Genius Scan可以辦到。” - 衛報

==企業版== 

 Genius Scan+ Premium Pack： 

 - 開箱即用（無需升級）Genius Scan+ 的所有高級功能（用下方的 + 表示）。 

管理組態： 

 - 部署到由MDM工具管理的設備中
 - 按使用者預先配置部署應用程式設定（例如，設定預設電子郵件位址，WebDAV / FTP 憑據） 
 - 控制使用者可以將文件匯出到哪些應用程式和服務
 - 無廣告

==主要功能== 

智慧掃描： 

 - 檔案檢測和背景移除
 - 失真校正
 - 陰影去除和缺陷清理
 - 濾鏡（黑白，白板，照片） 
 - 批量掃描

 PDF建立和編輯： 

 - 文件合併和拆分
 - 多頁PDF創建
 - 照片和PDF匯入

安全和隱私： 

 - 裝置上文件處理
 + 面容_ID 
 + PDF密碼加密

文件組織： 

 - 文件標記
 - 元數據和內容搜索
 + 自訂命名方案（智慧文件名稱） 
 + 使用Genius Cloud進行備份和多裝置同步（單獨訂閱） 

匯出：

 - 電子郵件
 + Box, Dropbox, Evernote, Expensify, Google Drive, iCloud Drive, OneDrive, OneNote, FTP, SugarSync, WebDAV. 
 + 任何與WebDAV相容的服務，例如Citrix ShareFile、NextCloud，ownCloud、Synology、Yandex。 
 + 自動後台自動匯出

OCR（文本識別）：

 + 文字提取
 + 創建可搜尋的PDF
 + 掃描名片和建立連絡人

==關於我們== 

The Grizzly Labs在法國巴黎市中心開發了Genius Scan。我們製作能夠説明全世界數百萬使用者的應用程式並在品質和隱私方面保持最高標準，我們為此感到自豪。如果您有任何疑問，請通過@thegrizzlylabs聯繫我們。

==定價和法律==

您可以訂閱Genius Cloud進行備份和同步。在這種情況下，Genius Scan的商店會顯示每個訂閱的持續時間和價格，並在購買時更新。訂單確認後，將從iTunes帳戶中收取付款。除非在當前期間結束前24小時內關閉自動續訂，否則訂閱會自動續訂。管理訂閱，禁用iTunes帳戶設置中的自動續訂。

us.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

Otter is a simple and beautiful food diary app that helps you track what you eat every day. No calorie counting, no complicated databases – just take photos, add notes, and reflect on your eating habits.

- Photo-based meal tracking – snap and save
- No ads, no distractions
- iCloud sync across all your devices

◆ FEATURES

- Photo Food Journal
Capture your meals with photos. A picture is worth a thousand calories – see what you eat at a glance.

- Daily Notes
Write about your day, how you felt, or what made each meal special.

- Water Tracker
Stay hydrated! Track your daily water intake with simple tap controls.

- Weight Log
Monitor your weight trends over time with easy-to-read records.

- Timeline View
Browse your food history in a beautiful timeline. See patterns in your eating habits.

- Search & Stats
Find past meals quickly and view your eating statistics.

- iCloud Sync
Your food diary stays safe and syncs automatically across iPhone, iPad, and Mac.


◆ A MINDFUL APPROACH TO EATING

Otter doesn't judge. There's no calorie counting or strict diet plans. Just a gentle companion to help you become more aware of what you eat. 

You are what you eat – let Otter help you remember it.

Questions? Contact us at OtterDietDiary@gmail.com

Notes Writer is an excellent assistant in study and business, also being effective for writing down your ideas and thoughts and sharing them!

Students, teachers, writers, doctors, journalists, scholars and business professionals use Notes Writer daily to store notes, annotations, memos, signed PDFs, papers, highlighted PDF text-books, lectures and more.

With Notes Writer Pro you can:

+ WRITE. EDIT. FORMAT
· Write Everywhere: Use Notes Writer as an stand-alone writing app even if you don’t have a computer or you are offline in the wilds
· Create rich text format (RTF) and advanced Markdown (MD) documents
· Define margins, headers/footers, paper sizes, MLA and APA style format
· Live counters: characters, words, sentences, lines, Avg. Word length, Words per sentence & reading time
· Text to Speech for proofreading

+ ANNOTATE PDFs. FILL FORMS. SIGN DOCUMENTS.

+ SHARE NOTES. EXPORT PDF, HTML…

+ AUTOMATIC BACKUPS. BE SAFE. PROTECT YOUR WORK

· Protect any folder or project with a passcode

The new game of the developer ""GameCoaster"", who made Dungeon Maker and Dungeon Defense!

A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss.
Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory.

us.releaseNotes:
The paid DLC “The End Of Karma” is now available! A massive update that unveils the final chapter of the story, and the decisive battle against the ancient god He Luo!

【v3.1.2 Patch Notes】
*Please install the game directly and do not uninstall the old version, otherwise you will lose your local save files! It is recommended to use the cloud save function for backup~
*The offline feature is now available. You will only need to complete the login verification after the initial game installation. Subsequently, you are able to play in the offline mode.

-----------The following is the content of this update----------

DLC “The End Of Karma”: 
For ten years, 'Bi-an' slumbered in a dream of ashes while the malevolent Heluo deity was fully unleashed, turning the world into chaos. Under the arduous support of Linglong and others, the Heluo Resistance once saw a glimmer of hope, but everything seemed so fragile in the face of madness and despair… 
Now, 'Bi-an' has awakened from the endless nightmare and returned to the real world. He will embark on his journey once more, initiating the ultimate battle.

 【New Chapters】Five New Chapters, Intense Boss Challenges 
Five brand new chapters will lead you through a world that is both familiar and strange, gradually approaching the sacred grounds of the Snake Dynasty, hidden deep within the earth’s core a thousand years ago. Six formidable end-of-chapter Bosses will present new challenges to players! 

【New Sects】Three New Sects, Smooth Combat Experience
 Three new sects are introduced: Wheels of Solar and Lunar, Underworld Vidyaraja, and Soul Blade Shura, along with six sect skills, offering players a novel combat experience! 

【New Talents】System of All Things, Free Talisman Matching 
A new talent tree system allows limited talent points to dictate your growth strategy and choices, and an Infinite Mode that breaks through all limits! Coupled with the special rune - Time Talisman, the diverse entries and effects provide greater freedom and intensity for build combinations. 

【New Story】Abundant Story Segments, Three Endings for Your Choices 
The might of the ancient gods is not easily extinguished; your decisions will lead to three distinct endings! Traverse timelines, face various challenges, and find a way to save everyone! 

【New Adaptation】Mobile-Exclusive Features 
A new “Automatically activate Sword Sheathing” feature has been added for enhanced gameplay smoothness.
us.description:
While the rich stinks of meat and wine, the bones of the poor litter the roadside.
Great injustice often leads to strange occurrences
Snow in July can only be remedied through blood.

Warm Snow is a Roguelike action game with a background set in a dark fantasy world, where the eerie 'Warm Snow' holds sway. You will play as the Warrior 'Bi-an' on a crusade against the Five Great Clans, in order to save a world teetering on the brink of destruction.

【A Dark Tale of Sword and Snow】
A strange phenomenon appeared during the 27th Year of the Longwu Era. Snow fell from the sky, which was warm rather than cold to the touch, and did not melt.
People who breathed in the 'Warm Snow' lost their minds and became monsters. This phenomenon was later known as 'Warm Snow'.
Embark on a journey as Warrior 'Bi-an' to search for the truth behind the 'Warm Snow' and put an end to the this never-ending darkness.

【Countless Combinations】
Seven sects, varied Relics, unpredictable excaliburs, the game is full of Rogue-like elements which will keep each challenge in your journey fresh and unique.
Each time you venture into the world would be a whole-new experience, pick your favorite playing style and challenge yourself.

【Thrilling Flying Sword System】
Perform critical destruction with swords that flicker between shadow and light. Control your flying swords with different attributes, attack modes and Relic boosts.

【Reincarnate and Collect the Fragments of Truth】
You decide how you will grow stronger!
Boost your abilities with talent points that you can assign at will.
The truth about this world is hidden in the randomly dropped 'Memory Fragments'.
Are you ready to discover the secrets behind the Five Great Clans and reveal the truth of this world?

【Mobile Version Optimizations】
· Button customization and Auto-Dash: Adjust the position and size of buttons according to your preferences. Enable the Auto-Dash feature to start auto dashing with the left joystick.
· Adjust the viewing distance freely: Adjust the size of the screen display according to your preferences.
· Auto Enemy Tracking: Enable the Auto Enemy Tracking feature for a silky smooth combat experience.

Minimum device requirement: iOS 12.0 or higher. Memory requirement: 4GB. Available RAM: 4GB

SUPPORT
If you encounter any issues during the game, you can send us feedback via the in-game Customer Service Center.
Customer Service Email: warmsnowgh@bilibili.com
Official Site: https://warmsnow.biligames.com
Twitter：https://twitter.com/WarmSnowGame
Discord: https://discord.gg/gC2nRfEQ
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@warmsnow6951

us.description: The table features the player as a member of a space fleet that completes missions to increase rank. Players can attain nine different ranks (listed from lowest to highest): Cadet, Ensign, Lieutenant, Captain, LT Commander, Commander, Commodore, Admiral, and Fleet Admiral. Players accept a mission by hitting "mission targets" which select which mission they will take, and by going up the "launch ramp". Each mission has a set number of things for players to do, such as hitting the "attack bumpers" (which are a set of four bumpers at the top of the table) eight times (this is the "target practice" mission). Some missions involve a number of steps which must be completed in sequence. Missions end either by being completed, or by being aborted due to running out of "fuel", as indicated by the lights in the passage that passes under the launch ramp. The "fuel" lights go out one by one at a time interval, and can be re-lit by having the ball go over them, or all at once by going up the launch ramp again. Upon completing a mission, some of the blue lights in a circle in the middle of the table turn on. When all of the lights in the blue circle turn on, the player's rank increases, and a light in the orange circle turns on.

us.description:
"Did you know that “Schadenfreude” is a German word defined as the concept of finding joy in someone else’s misfortune? It is also the main idea on which Neighbours back From Hell is built. A whole TV show based on playing increasingly outrageous pranks on your grumpy neighbor to keep the audience entertained, and viewership numbers high. It’s good to be bad in this early 2000s trash TV-inspired slapstick extravaganza! 

As Woody, the vengeful star protagonist of Neighbours back From Hell, you will prank your way through Seasons 1 and 2 of the fictitious, but aptly named TV show. Take the mischief from your nasty neighbor’s flat all the way to China, India, and Mexico where you will make sure his holiday is a living hell. While you’re at it, why limit targeting your antics at your neighbor, when you can involve his mother and fellow travelers? Whatever you decide to do, your trusty camera crew will be right there and keep a keen eye on all the action. You can let your crooked creativity flow freely and watch the neighbor rage in desperation. Just be mindful not to get caught by him or his companions, or they will whoop you good and your TV show will be taken off the air. If you perform well on the other hand, by creating more and more disarray and chaos in the neighbor’s life, ratings will increase, and you could win prestigious awards. "

Neighbours From Hell 1 & 2 Remastered in one package: 28 episodes set in the neighbor’s home, on a cruise liner, and in several different holiday locations around the world 

- All graphics newly rendered in Full HD 
- Framerate of all animations doubled for a smoother experience  
- Use stealth, skill, and style to perform the perfect ambush 
- Easy to use interface and controls 
- Superb cartoon-style graphics 
- Big band soundtrack 
- Game Center support
- Full controller support

© HandyGames

us.description:
In this eagerly anticipated sequel of the game “Clouds & Sheep”, the cute sheep are finally on the loose again! Solve countless quests and fulfill your wooly friends’ needs. Plant grass, flowers, trees and shear your animals’ different-colored wool to stock up your resources! Collect happy stars, harvest wood and flower petals and use them to provide your flock with food, accessories, toys and more! Control the clouds and make it rain to ensure your sheep never run out of fresh water to drink. If your sheep feel happy and content, they’ll bring tiny lambs into the world!

Every single animal is asking for your attention! The fluffy balls of wool love to be entertained. Make your sheep jump and use different toys like the trampoline, the seesaw and the swing to actively play with them! Watch your pets interact with each other and observe their reactions to the objects you give to them! Customize your flock’s pasture with fun objects and choose between different settings like the Wild West or Pirate scenery. Watch your flock run around by day and sleep by the cozy campfire at night. Do everything you can to keep your sheep happy and healthy to prevent them from becoming big, cottony clouds in the sky.

Features:
- PLAY WITHOUT ADS!
- Awesome sequel of the top game “Clouds & Sheep”
- Go on an epic adventure to find the legendary Fountain of Youth!
- Simulation game with adorable sheep
- Take care of your flock
- Raise sweet little lambs
- Actively play with your animals
- Give them many different items and objects
- Grow and harvest various resources
- Shear your sheep
- Customize their pasture
- Control the weather
- Day-night cycle
- Open-ended game set in a 3D world
- Suitable for kids, but also fun for the whole family
- MFi game controller support

us.description:
Develop your tiny village to a grand medieval empire with a thriving economy and happy villagers! Find spots for mining ore, harvest the crops of your farms and collect coins as taxes from your folk. Build jousting fields, taverns, marketplaces and beautify your city with impressive statues, magnificent monuments, and lush gardens. But there are also dangers lurking close by. Bandits are in the area, looking to plunder and pillage your peaceful town. Build barracks, guard towers and recruit brave soldiers to protect your citizens from harm. You rule the whole empire from your castle and make sure your inhabitants have fun and stay happy!

FEATURES
- PLAY WITHOUT ADS!
- City-building gameplay set in medieval times
- Cute inhabitants with their own daily routines
- Complex economy sim and deep production chains
- Dozens of different town and production buildings
- Optional military feature with soldiers and bandits

us.description:
Burn rubber and shred metal in the ultimate driving playground!

Wreckfest is jam-packed with upgrade and customization options. Whether you are preparing for your next demolition derby with reinforced bumpers, roll cages, side protectors and much more, or setting your car up for a banger race with engine performance parts like air filters, camshafts, fuel systems, etc., Wreckfest is shaping up to be the best combative motorsport game out there. 

• Unique Racing Experience – Exhilarating no-rules racing action with defining, once-in-a-lifetime moments that can be achieved only with a true-to-life physics simulation. Witness insane neck-to-neck fighting on high-speed circuits, face total destruction madness on crazy courses with intersections and oncoming traffic, or go for demolition dominance in derby arenas.

• Awesome Cars – Our cars are old, banged up, patched together... They ooze style and character! From old American heavy-hitters to agile Europeans and fun Asians, you won’t find anything like this in other games. 

• Meaningful Customization – Change not only the look of your cars but also upgrade their body armor – Reinforce them with heavy iron that protects you from damage, but also adds weight, which impacts the cars handling. Modify your car to make a robust tank or a fragile but lightning-fast rocket, or anything in between!

• Multiplayer – Wreck your friends in local multiplayer and take racing to the limit while chasing for demolition dominance!

• Challenge modes – Have hilarious fun with crop harvesters, lawn mowers, school buses, three-wheelers and much more! 

• Career Mode – Battle for championships, earn experience, unlock new upgrades and cars, and become the all-time Wreckfest champion!

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

tr.description:
Otter is a simple and beautiful food diary app that helps you track what you eat every day. No calorie counting, no complicated databases – just take photos, add notes, and reflect on your eating habits.

◆ WHY OTTER?

- Clean, minimal design with an adorable otter character
- Photo-based meal tracking – snap and save
- No ads, no distractions
- iCloud sync across all your devices

◆ FEATURES

- Photo Food Journal
Capture your meals with photos. A picture is worth a thousand calories – see what you eat at a glance.

- Daily Notes
Write about your day, how you felt, or what made each meal special.

- Water Tracker
Stay hydrated! Track your daily water intake with simple tap controls.

- Weight Log
Monitor your weight trends over time with easy-to-read records.

- Timeline View
Browse your food history in a beautiful timeline. See patterns in your eating habits.

- Search & Stats
Find past meals quickly and view your eating statistics.

- iCloud Sync
Your food diary stays safe and syncs automatically across iPhone, iPad, and Mac.


◆ A MINDFUL APPROACH TO EATING

Otter doesn't judge. There's no calorie counting or strict diet plans. Just a gentle companion to help you become more aware of what you eat. 

You are what you eat – let Otter help you remember it.

Questions? Contact us at OtterDietDiary@gmail.com

The "fuel" lights go out one by one at a time interval, and can be re-lit by having the ball go over them, or all at once by going up the launch ramp again. Upon completing a mission, some of the blue lights in a circle in the middle of the table turn on. When all of the lights in the blue circle turn on, the player's rank increases, and a light in the orange circle turns on.

tr.description:
"Did you know that “Schadenfreude” is a German word defined as the concept of finding joy in someone else’s misfortune? It is also the main idea on which Neighbours back From Hell is built. A whole TV show based on playing increasingly outrageous pranks on your grumpy neighbor to keep the audience entertained, and viewership numbers high. It’s good to be bad in this early 2000s trash TV-inspired slapstick extravaganza! 

As Woody, the vengeful star protagonist of Neighbours back From Hell, you will prank your way through Seasons 1 and 2 of the fictitious, but aptly named TV show. Take the mischief from your nasty neighbor’s flat all the way to China, India, and Mexico where you will make sure his holiday is a living hell. While you’re at it, why limit targeting your antics at your neighbor, when you can involve his mother and fellow travelers? Whatever you decide to do, your trusty camera crew will be right there and keep a keen eye on all the action. You can let your crooked creativity flow freely and watch the neighbor rage in desperation. Just be mindful not to get caught by him or his companions, or they will whoop you good and your TV show will be taken off the air. If you perform well on the other hand, by creating more and more disarray and chaos in the neighbor’s life, ratings will increase, and you could win prestigious awards. "

Neighbours From Hell 1 & 2 Remastered in one package: 28 episodes set in the neighbor’s home, on a cruise liner, and in several different holiday locations around the world 

- All graphics newly rendered in Full HD 
- Framerate of all animations doubled for a smoother experience  
- Use stealth, skill, and style to perform the perfect ambush 
- Easy to use interface and controls 
- Superb cartoon-style graphics 
- Big band soundtrack 
- Game Center support
- Full controller support

tr.description:
Burn rubber and shred metal in the ultimate driving playground!

Wreckfest is jam-packed with upgrade and customization options. Whether you are preparing for your next demolition derby with reinforced bumpers, roll cages, side protectors and much more, or setting your car up for a banger race with engine performance parts like air filters, camshafts, fuel systems, etc., Wreckfest is shaping up to be the best combative motorsport game out there. 

• Unique Racing Experience – Exhilarating no-rules racing action with defining, once-in-a-lifetime moments that can be achieved only with a true-to-life physics simulation. Witness insane neck-to-neck fighting on high-speed circuits, face total destruction madness on crazy courses with intersections and oncoming traffic, or go for demolition dominance in derby arenas.

• Awesome Cars – Our cars are old, banged up, patched together... They ooze style and character! From old American heavy-hitters to agile Europeans and fun Asians, you won’t find anything like this in other games. 

• Meaningful Customization – Change not only the look of your cars but also upgrade their body armor – Reinforce them with heavy iron that protects you from damage, but also adds weight, which impacts the cars handling. Modify your car to make a robust tank or a fragile but lightning-fast rocket, or anything in between!

• Multiplayer – Wreck your friends in local multiplayer and take racing to the limit while chasing for demolition dominance!

• Challenge modes – Have hilarious fun with crop harvesters, lawn mowers, school buses, three-wheelers and much more! 

• Career Mode – Battle for championships, earn experience, unlock new upgrades and cars, and become the all-time Wreckfest champion!

pt.description: The table features the player as a member of a space fleet that completes missions to increase rank. Players can attain nine different ranks (listed from lowest to highest): Cadet, Ensign, Lieutenant, Captain, LT Commander, Commander, Commodore, Admiral, and Fleet Admiral. Players accept a mission by hitting "mission targets" which select which mission they will take, and by going up the "launch ramp". Each mission has a set number of things for players to do, such as hitting the "attack bumpers" (which are a set of four bumpers at the top of the table) eight times (this is the "target practice" mission). Some missions involve a number of steps which must be completed in sequence. Missions end either by being completed, or by being aborted due to running out of "fuel", as indicated by the lights in the passage that passes under the launch ramp. The "fuel" lights go out one by one at a time interval, and can be re-lit by having the ball go over them, or all at once by going up the launch ramp again. Upon completing a mission, some of the blue lights in a circle in the middle of the table turn on. When all of the lights in the blue circle turn on, the player's rank increases, and a light in the orange circle turns on.

pt.description:
"""Você sabia que “Schadenfreude” é uma palavra alemã para definir o conceito de encontrar alegria no infortúnio de outra pessoa? É também a ideia principal do jogo Vizinhos do Inferno. Um programa de TV baseado em pegadinhas cada vez mais ultrajantes contra seu vizinho mal-humorado. Tudo para manter o público entretido e o número de visualizações alto. Ser mau é algo bom nessa extravagância de palhaçada inspirada na TV do início dos anos 2000! 

Como o Woody, o protagonista vingativo do Vizinhos do Inferno, você vai fazer pegadinhas através das temporadas 1 e 2 do fictício, mas apropriadamente chamado programa de TV. Faça travessuras do apartamento do seu vizinho desagradável até a China, Índia e México, onde você garantirá que as férias dele sejam um inferno. Já que você está dedicado em fazer isso, por que limitar suas travessuras em um vizinho, quando você pode envolver a mãe dele e outros viajantes? Não importa o que você deseja fazer, sua confiável equipe de filmagem estará lá, pronta para toda a ação. Você pode deixar sua criatividade fluir livremente e ver o vizinho se enfurecer em desespero. Apenas tome cuidado para não ser pego por ele ou seus companheiros. Se isso acontecer, eles vão gritar com você e seu programa de TV será tirado do ar. Por outro lado, se você tiver um bom desempenho, criando mais desordem e caos na vida do vizinho, as avaliações irão aumentar e você poderá ganhar prêmios de prestígio. ""

O Vizinhos do Inferno 1 e 2 remasterizado em um pacote: 28 episódios ambientados na casa do vizinho, em um cruzeiro e em vários locais de férias ao redor do mundo

pt.description:
Queime borracha e destrua metal no maior circuito de corrida livre que há!

Wreckfest possui uma paulada de opções de melhorias e personalizações. Você pode se preparar para a próxima corrida de demolição com para-choques reforçados, santantônios, protetores laterais e muito mais, ou pode preparar o carro para uma Corrida Lata Velha com peças de desempenho de motor como filtros de ar, árvores de cames, sistemas de combustível etc. Wreckfest está se tornando o melhor jogo de combate motorizado que existe. 

• Experiência de Corrida Única - Corridas de ação sem regras e de tirar o fôlego, com momentos únicos possíveis apenas graças à simulação física realista. Participe de batalhas em circuitos de alta velocidade, enfrente a possibilidade de destruição total em rotas malucas com intersecções e tráfego ou parta para a dominação nas arenas de destruição.

• Carros Incríveis - Nossos carros são velhos, acabados e remendados, mas cheios de estilo! Dos velhos guerreiros americanos aos ágeis europeus, passando pelos asiáticos divertidos! Não tem nada como isso em outros jogos. 

• Personalização Relevante - Altere não só a aparência do carro, mas também a blindagem. Reforce-os com placas de ferro pesadas que protegem contra dano, mas aumentam o peso, impactando o controle. Modifique o carro para que se torne um tanque robusto, um foguete frágil e veloz ou qualquer coisa entre esses extremos!

• Multijogador - Destrua seus amigos no modo multijogador local e corra no limite enquanto os persegue para dominar na demolição!

• Modos Desafiadores - Divirta-se com colheitadeiras, cortadores de grama, ônibus escolares, triciclos e muito mais! 

• Modo Carreira - Batalhe em campeonatos, ganhe experiência, desbloqueie novas melhorias e carros e torne-se o campeão máximo de Wreckfest!
